response.overview: Chronicles the powerful friendship between two young Black teenagers navigating the harrowing trials of reform school together in Florida.
response.tagline: Like justice, it existed in theory.
response.title: Nickel Boys

release_dates.note: Philadelphia Film Festival / Woodstock Film Festival
